definition: to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
independent and autonomous (idiom); self-determination/to act independently/to maintain control over one's own affairs
golden rooster stands on one leg (tai chi posture)/standing on one leg

pinyin: du2 li4 Zhong1 wen2 bi3 hui4

definition: Commonwealth of Independent States (former Soviet Union)
pinyin: Du2 li4 guo2 jia1 lian2 he2 ti3

definition: to live apart from parents (of married couple)/to achieve independence

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Du2 li4 Zhan4 zheng1

sentences.english: This is my first stand-alone blog , and it's still under construction.
sentences.chinese: 這是我的第一個獨立博客，還在建設中。

sentences.english: It is now the highest-grossing independent British film of all time.
sentences.chinese: 如今，這已成爲迄今爲止最成功的英國獨立電影。

sentences.english: The first part narrates Shang and Zhou period personalities do not stand independently.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分講述商周時期人格的不獨立。

sentences.english: So there's real possibility of one of them existing without the other.
sentences.chinese: 這麼一來它們就真得有可能獨立存在了。

sentences.english: Only few States continue to maintain a separate chancery court.
sentences.chinese: 只有少數幾個州繼續保持獨立的衡平法院。

sentences.english: Independent, self-motivated, enthusiasm and well organized with analytical mind.
sentences.chinese: 獨立，自我激勵，積極性和良好的分析能力，組織。

sentences.english: Eachindependent cylinder's press-roller has precision micro-adjuster to guarantee the effect of sueding .
sentences.chinese: 每支獨立汽缸壓布輥精確的微調，能確保磨毛效果。

sentences.english: ROC Air force information system with internet service is a self-contained and privately operating network.
sentences.chinese: 空軍資訊系統網路服功能系獨立性之封閉型網路。

sentences.english: Ninety-five percent of cheetah cubs die before reaching independence.
sentences.chinese: 95%的獵豹幼崽在能夠獨立生存之前死亡。

sentences.english: Jefferson wrote, was the declaration of independence was "the referee" alliance.
sentences.chinese: 傑斐遜曾寫道，《獨立宣言》是“籲請世界的裁判”。

sentences.english: Repeat this procedure until every pattern piece has been individually traced-off.
sentences.chinese: 重複這道程序，直到每一張衣片紙樣獨立描下。

sentences.english: You know, I guess what we need is an independent leader.
sentences.chinese: 我想我們所需要的是一位獨立黨的領導人。

sentences.english: A separate inlet with a ceramic frit is used to aerate the perfusate.
sentences.chinese: 用玻璃料製成的一個獨立進口暴露在灌流液中。

sentences.english: Theanti-inflammatory effect of Atorvastatin maybe beyond that of lipid lowering .
sentences.chinese: 阿託伐他汀的抗炎作用獨立於降脂作用之外。

sentences.english: First, break up the main task into data- or functionally-independent subtasks.
sentences.chinese: 首先，將主任務分解爲數據或功能獨立的子任務。

sentences.english: Article 3 The Macao Special Administrative Region shall be vested with independent judicial power, including that of final adjudication.
sentences.chinese: 第三條澳門特別行政區享有獨立的司法權和終審權。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to be in charge of/to take responsibility for/to be to blame/conscientious
